parts.text: {"word":"oddities","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"奇妙さ、異常さ、風変わりなもの、珍品","english_definition":"strange or peculiar qualities; strange or peculiar people or things.","examples":[{"sentence":"The museum is full of oddities.","translation":"その博物館は珍品でいっぱいだ。"},{"sentence":"He collected oddities from around the world.","translation":"彼は世界中から珍品を集めた。"},{"sentence":"Her behavior was full of oddities.","translation":"彼女の行動は奇妙なことばかりだった。"},{"sentence":"The town is known for its many oddities.","translation":"その町は多くの風変わりなことで知られている。"}],"collocations":["collect oddities (珍品を集める)","a collection of oddities (珍品のコレクション)","full of oddities (奇妙さでいっぱい)","historical oddities (歴史的な珍品)","local oddities (地元の珍品)"],"synonyms":["peculiarity","strangeness","unusualness","bizarreness","eccentricity","curiosity","rarity"],"antonyms":["normality","ordinariness","usualness","commonplace"],"related_words":["odd (形容詞: 奇妙な、風変わりな)","oddly (副詞: 奇妙に、風変わりに)","oddball (名詞: 変人、変わり者)"],"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低い (Relatively low)","priority":"★★☆"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"\"**Oddities**\"は、複数形で使われることが多く、単数形 \"oddity\" は、個々の奇妙なものや珍品を指します。この単語は、単に珍しいだけでなく、どこか風変わりで、興味を引くようなニュアンスを含んでいます。博物館の展示物や、個人のコレクション、あるいは行動や習慣など、様々な文脈で使用されます。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He is an oddities.","correct":"✓ He is an oddity.","note":"人を指す場合、単数形の \"oddity\" を使う必要があります。複数形の \"oddities\" は、複数の奇妙なものを指します。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The oddities is very interesting.","correct":"✓ The oddities are very interesting.","note":"複数形の \"oddities\" を主語にする場合は、動詞も複数形にする必要があります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"etymology":{"value":"\"Odd\" (奇妙な) + \"-ity\" (名詞を作る接尾辞) から派生。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈɒdɪtiz/","syllables":"od-di-ties"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"oddities"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"\"**Oddities**\"は、少し難しい単語で、「奇妙なもの」や「珍品」という意味です。博物館で見たことのないようなものを指したり、人の変わった行動を指したりするときに使います。例えば、「The museum was filled with historical **oddities**（博物館は歴史的な珍品でいっぱいだった）」のように使います。日常会話よりも、少しフォーマルな場面で使われることが多いです。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The shop was filled with strange **oddities** from around the world.","translation":"その店は世界中からの奇妙な珍品でいっぱいだった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"珍品"},{"sentence":"He had a collection of unusual **oddities** in his attic.","translation":"彼は屋根裏に珍しい珍品のコレクションを持っていた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"珍品"},{"sentence":"The town's annual festival celebrates its local **oddities**.","translation":"その町の毎年恒例の祭りは、地元の風変わりなものを祝う。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"風変わりなもの"},{"sentence":"The book explores the **oddities** of human behavior.","translation":"その本は人間の行動の奇妙さを探求する。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"奇妙さ"}]}
